flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=705>>705
Insurance covers 705*0.8=$<<705*0.8=564>>564
So he has to pay 705-564=$<<705-564=141>>141
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+141=$<<1200+141=1341>>1341

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700, not 705. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
